nodes.text: Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith 20

Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith 20 is the twentieth issue of the canon comic book series Star Wars: Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith. It was written by Charles Soule, illustrated by Giuseppe Camuncoli, and published on August 22, 2018 by Marvel Comics.
"FORTRESS VADER," PART TWO! A thief faces the consequences for their crime. EMPEROR PALPATINE rewards DARTH VADER with three gifts…A thing, a choice and a voice.
